title: Ulu Cliff House Chill (Half-day)
overview: Relax at Ulu Cliff House, a clifftop oasis with infinity pools, restaurants, and sunset views.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy the infinity pools and cocktail bar.
Experience the daily sunset session with music and drinks.

title: Ulu Cliff House Day Retreat (Full-day)
overview: A full day of poolside relaxation, dining, and sunset views at Ulu Cliff House.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy the infinity pools and multiple restaurants.
Relax by the pool, enjoy cocktails, or take in the sunset session.
